alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Northern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 2:25PM EST until January 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following areas, Chesterfield, Northern Lancaster and Southern Lancaster. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Ongoing line of storms in the watch area with efficient rain rates may lead to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
